name: Hide and Seek (itch) (SamurGuy)
description:
This is just a dumb little concept game, I wanted to challenge myself to get something finished-ish out by Halloween. It's messy and the gameplay is non-existent, but I learned a lot by making it. Have fun (maybe). 

Duck between hiding spots and don't let the seeker find you.

Controls:

Left Control to crouch (You will be hidden if you crouch while in a hiding spot)

Space to climb ladders
